item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
True. Believe Blizzard made a post yesterday correcting the patch notes that the recruit channel is OFF by default.
Calm down everyone! Your children are safe from wondering what G, L, B and/or Ts are.
item.content:encoded:
True. Believe Blizzard made a post yesterday correcting the patch notes that the recruit channel is OFF by default.

Calm down everyone! Your children are safe from wondering what G, L, B and/or Ts are.

item.title: By: savagex
item.dc:creator: savagex
item.description: It appears that the Guild recruit chat is off by default, which is really ok by me.
item.content:encoded: It appears that the Guild recruit chat is off by default, which is really ok by me.

item.title: By: Dom
item.dc:creator: Dom
item.description: Ha! I'm assuming this is directly related to the whole GLBT fiasco. Most people I talked to who agreed with Blizzard's stance had said that the problem was the General channel is the only place to recruit. My response was that there was nowhere better to do so. Looks like now there is! Presumably we're allowed to discuss our sexuality at great length in THAT channel.
item.content:encoded: Ha! I’m assuming this is directly related to the whole GLBT fiasco. Most people I talked to who agreed with Blizzard’s stance had said that the problem was the General channel is the only place to recruit. My response was that there was nowhere better to do so. Looks like now there is! Presumably we’re allowed to discuss our sexuality at great length in THAT channel.
